lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is no longer a punch line in football and basketball due to its larger staff, the transparency offered by social networking tools and countless media investigations.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. is no longer a punch line in football and basketball due to its larger staff, the transparency offered by social networking tools and countless media investigations.

headline.main: As N.C.A.A. Gets Tough, Coaches Take Notice
headline.seo: As N.C.A.A. Gets Tough on Enforcement, Coaches Take Notice
